name: Ext_R5_Task_doNotPerform
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Task.doNotPerform for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Task.doNotPerform from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Task|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: True if Task is prohibiting action
element.definition: If true indicates that the Task is asking for the specified action to *not* occur.
element.comment: `Task.doNotPerform` has no related element in R4B:Task `Task.doNotPerform` has no related element in R4B:Task `Task.doNotPerform` has no related element in R4B:Task `Task.doNotPerform` has no related element in R4B:Task
element.isModifierReason: If true, this element negates the Task. For example, instead of a request to perform a task, it is a request _not_ to perform a task.

element.short: True if Task is prohibiting action
element.definition: If true indicates that the Task is asking for the specified action to *not* occur.
element.comment: `Task.doNotPerform` has no related element in R4B:Task `Task.doNotPerform` has no related element in R4B:Task `Task.doNotPerform` has no related element in R4B:Task `Task.doNotPerform` has no related element in R4B:Task
